text: Aur kiya yeh log zamin mein chalay phiray nahi jiss mein dekhtay bhaaltay kay jo log inn say pehlay ho guzray hain unn ka anjam kiya hua? Halankay woh qooat mein inn say barhay huyey thay aur Allah aisa nahi hai kay koi cheez uss ko hara day na aasmano mein aur na zamin mein woh baray ilm wala bari qudrat wala hai
